name: EUROPEAN BICYCLE MANUFACTURERS ASSOCIATION
goal: Bicycle Advocacy, Creating many more thousands more Green Jobs in EU, Enhancing Bicycle Infrastructure in EU, Keeping, enhancing, increasing the EU Bicycle Industry in Europe with current 800 SMEs and over 90.000 workers against unfair competition
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Humanitarian Aid, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Market Economy Status China, Modernization of Trade Defense Instruments, new anti-dumping methodology
